alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Sheboygan; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 12:24AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Fond du Lac, northern Washington, northern Dodge and southwestern Sheboygan Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1223 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Waupun to 10 miles northwest of Horicon to near Beaver Dam. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Bend, Waupun, Jackson, Mayville, Kewaskum, Horicon, Lomira, Campbellsport, Theresa, Newburg, Oakfield, Burnett, Addison, Ashford, Byron, Fox Lake, Alto, Eden, Cascade and Brownsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Sheboygan; Washington
